variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiEntityType

description: Description of a network entity. A network entity may be a router,
router interface, interface group aggregate, or interface group
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiEntityDescription

description: Type of the traffic monitored for an alert condition.
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiTrafficType

description: Threshold for an alert. May be in bps, pps, fps, or utilization
percentage. For very large values, M or G may be prepended to the
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiThreshold

description: Measured value for an alert. May be in bps, pps, fps, or utilization
percentage. For very large values, M or G may be prepended to the
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiTrigger

description: Number of interfaces involved in triggering the alert.
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiInterfaceCount

description: The given AuthX collector has not communicated with the given
controller since the given last seen
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::authxCollectorDownTrap PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiController s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiUrl s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxIp a 192.0.2.1 PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxType s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiLastSeen c 9999

description: An IP address of an AuthX collector.
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxIp

description: The given AuthX collector has reestablished communication with the
given controller. It also tells you last seen, and the downtime
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::authxCollectorUpTrap PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiController s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiUrl s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxIp a 192.0.2.1 PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxType s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiLastSeen c 9999 PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiDuration t 31536000

description: An IP address of an AuthX collector.
variables.name: PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiAuthxIp

description: The given collector should be running an IP tee, but the tee process
is not running, and hasn't been since the last seen time.

event.Summary: IP tee is down on collector $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::ipTeeDownTrap PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiController s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiUrl s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiCollector s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiLastSeen c 9999

description: The IP tee has resumed running on the given collector. It had stopped
running at the given last seen time, and was down for the given

event.Summary: IP tee is up on collector $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::ipTeeUpTrap PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiController s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiUrl s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiCollector s EXAMPLE PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiLastSeen c 9999 PRAVAIL-NSI-MIB::nsiDuration t 31536000
